nodes.text: El-Les was an Arcona male bounty hunter whom the Galactic Republic employed as a drill instructor for the Grand Army clone troopers. During his time in Tipoca City, capital of the planet Kamino, El-Les worked with Bric—a fellow mercenary—to train groups of clone cadets such as Bravo Squad and Domino Squad.
El-Les made his first appearance in the third season episode "Clone Cadets" of Star Wars: The Clone Wars. He was voiced by Nolan North.
